name: Fired!
description:
Favorite job and well-established life balance, what else do you need from life?

It was a normal Thursday, I was developing pictures from the last experiment.

But then I heard a knock and a note was slipped under the door. I took out a cigarette, it was all over...

Dynamic top down slasher in which the player decides to flaunt with all his offenders. The player has the opportunity to take revenge on that janitors who constantly pulled out the wires and the guards who constantly searches at the checkpoint for too long. The buff system will help the player to realize his revenge, but remember, everything has its price

- Destroy the environment

- Take revenge on colleagues

- Get new abilities, but don't forget that you have to pay for everything

Control:

WASD - Move

SPACE - Dash 

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Attack 

Developing Team:

Vlad twomdx - Game Designer

Nyuta - 2D Artist

Arkadiy Mikhaylov - 3D Artist

Tymur Matukhno - 3D Artist

iwannabesonic - Programmer

Corwin Aleksandrov - Programmer

Nikita Skorikov - Programmer

Ivan Barabash - Technical Artist
